topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack Managed Private Cloud

othermeta.name: product-version2
othermeta.content: HPE Helion Openstack 2.0 Managed Private Cloud

body.p: HPE Helion OpenStack Managed Private Cloud is a private distribution of OpenStack cloud software, the leading open source cloud computing platform. This HPE Helion distribution, installed and administered by HPE, lets you manage and operate open source-based clouds on a resilient, maintainable platform. HPE Helion OpenStack enables cost-effective scalability of IT services and business agility and, as part of the HPE Helion portfolio, it is backed by a wide range of related cloud products, services, and professional support.

section.title: Get Started with HPE Helion OpenStack
section.p: The following links and tools will help you understand, deploy, and run your HPE Helion OpenStack 2.0 cloud.

li.xref: HPE Helion OpenStack 2.0 Managed Private Cloud Overview
